section.heading: Rules and regulations relating to park

content.p:
* ยง 212. Rules and regulations relating to park. The use of Bethpage
park shall be subject to the rules and regulations of the commissioner
of parks and recreation and the commission, as provided in the parks and
recreation law, in the same manner as if such property were a park or
parkway in the ninth park region under the jurisdiction of the
commissioner of parks and recreation; provided, however, that the
commissioner of parks and recreation and the commission shall have no
authority to alter or change any of the facilities hereby placed under
the authority or do anything which will impair the security of the
bondholders or violate limitations contained in any agreement with the
bondholders.
 * NB (Abolished in 1975)
